means: 涕灭威（内吸性杀虫、杀螨剂）

sentence.Network_en: A policeman has been shot dead in an ambush.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名警察在一次伏击中中弹身亡。

sentence.Network_en: The gunmen, lying in ambush, opened fire, killing the driver.
sentence.Network_cn: 埋伏的枪手开枪打死了司机。

sentence.Network_en: Two soldiers were killed in a terrorist ambush.
sentence.Network_cn: 两名士兵遭到恐怖分子伏击而死亡。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文字典_百度文库 ... ambulance 救护车 ambush 埋伏 amen 阿们.
而被伏击（ambush）大概也是从这个词根来的。大家一定会觉得滑稽，说人为什么要取一个叫“Bush”的姓呢？
伏字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 伏案〖 bendoverone'sdesk〗 伏兵〖 (troopsin)ambush〗 伏尔加河〖 theVolgaRiver〗.

list.abs: 埋伏营销（ambush marketing），又译为“伏击式营销”或“偷袭营销”，源于体育赞助。
广告英文术语大全 ... 倡导广告 advocacy advertising 伏击式营销 ambush marketing 视听材料 audiovisual materials.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'place troops in hiding in order to surprise an enemy'): from Old French embusche (noun), embuschier (verb), based on a late Latin word meaning 'to place in a wood'; related to bush

entry.def: If a group of people ambush their enemies, they attack them after hiding and waiting for them.

example.ex: The Guatemalan army says rebels ambushed and killed 10 patrolmen.
example.tran: 危地马拉军方说叛乱分子伏击打死了10名巡逻兵。

entry.def: An ambush is an attack on someone by people who have been hiding and waiting for them.

example.ex: A policeman has been shot dead in an ambush.
example.tran: 一次伏击中一名警察中弹身亡。

entry.def: If someone is lying in ambush, they are hiding and waiting for someone, usually to attack them.

example.ex: The gunmen, lying in ambush, opened fire, killing the driver.
example.tran: 埋伏的枪手开枪打死了司机。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of concealing yourself and lying in wait to attack by surprise

auth_sentence.content: WO2 Palmer was on patrol when the ambush happened.

auth_sentence.content: Once did I lay an ambush for your life.

auth_sentence.content: On Thursday one peacekeeper was killed in an ambush.

sentences.en: A whole regiment of the enemy troop got caught in our ambush was eliminated completely.
sentences.cn: 整整一个团的敌军中了我方埋伏后被全部消灭。

sentences.en: Several passers-by were killed in the ambush.
sentences.cn: 几名过路人在伏击中被杀害。

sentences.en: The general ambushed his troops in the dense woods.
sentences.cn: 将军把部队埋伏在浓密的树林里。

sentences.en: Our soldiers lay in ambush in the jungle for the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我方战士埋伏在丛林中等待敌人。
